statements: DELETE FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity >= 100 AND unit = 'kg';
DELETE FROM Pesticides WHERE quantity < 100 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Corporation';
DELETE FROM pesticides WHERE name = 'Insecticide XYZ';
DELETE FROM pesticides WHERE batch_number = 'P123' AND type = 'herbicide';
DELETE FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE supplier = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM fertilizer_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND supplier = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND toxicity_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-12-01' AND quantity_change > 100;
